div.div: at Grove City, Pa. | Robert E Thorn Field

tr.td: Grove City wins toss, will receive. Saint Vincent defends north goal
Sam Elliott kickoff 60 yards to the GRO05, Gabriel Moore return 25 yards to the GRO30 (Damon Black).
Andrew Schauer rush for 1 yard to the GRO31 (Kim Ornis).
